Package saleable

Class HealingItem

  • java.lang.Object
    • saleable.Saleable
      • saleable.HealingItem
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Selectable

    public class HealingItem
extends Saleable
    Defines a Saleable object that has the ability to restore health to a Hero.
    Author:
    fer25, par116

      • heal

        public void heal​(Hero selected_hero,
                 Team team)
        Apply the HealingItem to the Hero. This causes the TimerTask to be initiated and will continue to run until the Healing is complete
        Parameters:
        selected_hero - Current hero and stats
        team - Object

      • setRandom

        public void setRandom​(java.util.Random r)
        Description copied from class: Saleable
        Provides a psuedo random number generator to the object. This means that the same generator can be used for all object creations as if multiple new Random object are created in quick succession they all tend to produce the same first few numbers
        Specified by:
        setRandom in class Saleable
        Parameters:
        r - The Random object to be used by the Saleable
